snippet: Fazil Say, given a 10-month suspended sentence for insulting Islam and offending Muslims, said the accusations violated human rights.
abstract: Turkish court gives suspended 10-month prison term to Fazil Say, internationally acclaimed Turkish pianist and composer convicted of insulting Islam and offending Muslims in postings on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: Fazil Say, given a 10-month suspended sentence for insulting Islam and offending Muslims, said the accusations violated human rights.

headline.seo: Turkish Pianist Sentenced for Twitter Postings
headline.main: Pianist’s Posts on Twitter Spur Penalty From Turkey
headline.print_headline: Pianist’s Posts On Twitter Spur Penalty From Turkey

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
